title: Student Worker Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Berea College
Interview Descriptions: You are assigned your first job position at Berea College, unless you advocate and network during the orientation events with campus departments. I found my first job by approaching the department's information table and had an interview with them before I started classes. All the questions for the interview were behavioral.
Interview Questions: If you had to choose one item to do something with, what item would that be and what would you do with it?

title: Resident Advisor (RA) Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. I interviewed at Berea College in Apr 2022
Interview Descriptions: It was a very relaxed setting talking to an Area Coordinator. Asking different scenarios of what could happen and what you would do. Also seeing what you can bring to the table
Interview Questions: What would you do if you had a pair of roommates arguing?

title: Alumni Associate Interview
Interview Descriptions: quick and friendly. I met everyone on the team and could see myself fitting there. took around 30 minutes. Asked me about previous experience as well as examples of work that I did and was successful. They Asked about how I thought my previous experience would set me up well for the work I would be completing there.
Interview Questions: what can you contribute to our team

title: Information Technology Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. I interviewed at Berea College (Berea, KY) in Jan 2020
Interview Descriptions: The interview was very easy. It consisted of only behavioral questions. The overall experience was very good to answer those questions very easily.  The interviewer was very well-mannered and speaking well.
Interview Questions: How do you handle the bugs in the code?

title: Program Associate Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 6 weeks. I interviewed at Berea College (Berea, KY)
Interview Descriptions: I was called to schedule an interview initially. After that there was an extremely long wait to hear whether I was going to get a second interview or not. I can definitely say Berea is very thorough with their interview process.
Interview Questions: Why does this program matter to you?

title: IT Student Worker Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Berea College (Berea, KY) in Jun 2017
Interview Descriptions: When it comes to the interview process, research and preparation for the interview can often times determine your chances of making it to the next step. One of the best ways to get ready for a job interview is to practice your responses to any and all interview questions – even the downright weird.
Interview Questions: Can you tell me a little about yourself

title: Student Worker Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. I interviewed at Berea College
Interview Descriptions: You are automatically assigned to a labor position when you are accepted to school. You can after 1 semester or a year switch labor positions. You apply for and get a new position by simply talking to the supervisor in the area you wish to work.
Interview Questions: The interview questions if any simply ask what experience you have or why you think you could do the job well. As you don't turn in a resume, the interview takes the place of a resume.

title: Teaching Assistant Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Berea College (New York, NY)
Interview Descriptions: There was not a big interview process. To become a TA you have to demonstrate that you can excel academically and are willing to help your peers. The position for becoming TA has to be open and it largely varies between different programs. Usually you will have to be nominated by your professor.
Interview Questions: Would you like to be a Teaching Assistant?

title: Web Developer Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Berea College (Berea, KY) in Dec 2015
Interview Descriptions: The process was brief and straight to the point. It took one day. I interviewed with my supervisor, he was very nice and friendly. He asked me to start the next day once I finished the interview.
Interview Questions: Why do you want to work with us

title: Administrative Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 months. I interviewed at Berea College (Berea, KY) in Oct 2014
Interview Descriptions: The interview process was long and drawn out due to the conference travel and event management of the staff who I was interviewing with. It took several weeks after submitting an application before I heard anything from them about an interview.
Interview Questions: None of the interview questions strayed too far from the traditional interview questions: tell us about yourself, your professional goals, strengths, and weaknesses.

title: Teaching Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Berea College (Berea, KY) in Aug 2013
Interview Descriptions: The decision process was based on past experience and interests, and an initial meeting with the faculty. A resume was required, and was also used during the initial application to the college. After this was submitted, a campus visit was arranged and the faculty/staff of the appropriate program met with applicants and instructed them in the duties and the tasks that some of their positions would require, and asked additional questions about applicants' interests and skills.
Interview Questions: Why do you want to work in the Technology and Applied Design department, and why do you think you would be successful here?

title: Office Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 3 days. I interviewed at Berea College (Berea, KY) in Jun 2011
Interview Descriptions: I was in dire need of obtaining a job to support my pregnant wife in the summer of 2011, I went into the Berea labor office and asked if they were hiring, and by chance, they were. There were 8 people being considered for the job, but I was selected as the person to do the job due to my extreme level of awesome.
Interview Questions: What do you want to do in the future?

title: CELTS Student Labor Position Interview
Application Type: The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Berea College (Berea, KY) in Apr 2008
Interview Descriptions: CELTS is service oriented so you have to be prepared to describe you interest in service and the prior experience you've had before college that will relevant to your work at CELTS. Overall they want to see that you are really interested in service and that you have research that particular program you want to work for.
Interview Questions: Tell me a time that you have enjoyed service?
